meanings.definition: Having no purpose or use; meaningless.
meanings.sent2: The teacher found the pointless discussion frustrating.
meanings.sent3: It was pointless to argue with the stubborn cat.
meanings.sent4: The old watch was a pointless relic of the past.
meanings.sent5: The endless maze seemed as pointless as chasing one's shadow.

meanings.definition: Lacking a point or sharp tip.
meanings.sent1: The blunt pencil was pointless for drawing.
meanings.sent2: The rounded scissors were pointless for cutting.
meanings.sent3: The dull knife was as pointless as a spoon.
meanings.sent4: The flat screwdriver felt as pointless as a stick.
meanings.sent5: The smooth rock was as pointless as a pebble.

meanings.sent1: The lazy student's work was pointless.
meanings.sent2: The careless painting looked pointless on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The sloppy handwriting made the note seem pointless.
meanings.sent4: The messy room was a pointless display of disorganization.
meanings.sent5: The untrained dog's tricks were as pointless as barking at the moon.
